text: Antiwar.com is an English language website containing news and opinions related to the opposition to war. The site was founded in December of 1995, as a response to the Bosnian War. Justin Raimondo is a founder and editorial director. ==Other websites== * Antiwar.com Category:American websites Category:War Category:Libertarianism Category:1995 establishments in the United States
title: Antiwar.com
